info.title: OpenClaw API
info.description:
Unified API for OpenClaw Agent Management AND Gmail Service.

- **Agents, Chat, Skills**: `/api/...`
- **Gmail, Calendar, Secrets**: `/api/gmail/...`

get.description: Return gateway status, agent count, and server version.
List all registered agents.

post.description: Create a new OpenClaw agent (filesystem + gateway registration).

get.description: Get details for a single agent.

patch.description: Update an agent's identity, role, or personality files.

delete.description: Delete an agent (gateway de-registration + filesystem cleanup).

post.description: Send a message to an agent. Returns a streaming SSE response.

message.description: The user message to send to the agent.

session_id.description: Optional session id for DM isolation.

recent_context.description: Recent conversation context for group chats.

post.description: Send a message and get the full response (non-streaming).

message.description: The user message to send to the agent.

session_id.description: Optional session id for DM isolation.

recent_context.description: Recent conversation context for group chats.

get.description: List sessions for a specific agent. Filter by user_id (DM) or room_id (group).
List all sessions across all agents. Optionally filter by user_id.
Get chat history for a specific user DM session.
Get chat history for a group room session.
List all installed skill slugs.

post.description: Create a new skill. name becomes the folder slug (kebab-case).

get.description: Get metadata for a specific skill.

patch.description: Update the SKILL.md content for an existing skill.

delete.description: Delete a skill and its directory.

get.description: Get the raw SKILL.md content for a specific skill.
List all global skills with an `installed` flag for this agent.

post.description: Install a globally-available skill into this agent's workspace by name.
Create a custom skill directly in this agent's workspace.

get.description: List all skills installed for a specific agent.
Get metadata for a specific agent skill.

patch.description: Update the SKILL.md content for an agent-specific skill.

delete.description: Remove a skill from a specific agent's workspace.

get.description: Get the raw SKILL.md content for a specific agent skill.
List cron jobs. Optionally filter by user_id and/or session_id.

schema.title: Response List Crons Api Crons Get

get.description: Get details for a single cron job.

patch.description: Update an existing cron job's schedule, payload, or enabled state.

post.description: Manually trigger a cron job to run immediately.

get.description: Get the run history for a cron job.
List tasks. Optionally filter by agent_id and/or status.

schema.title: Response List Tasks Api Tasks Get

get.description: Get a single task by ID.

patch.description: Update a task (status, sub-tasks, issues, etc.).
Mark a specific issue on a task as resolved (by the human).

post.description: Headless OAuth callback — accepts an authorization code or a full redirect URL.

get.description:
List emails with optional Gmail search query.

The `query` param supports full Gmail search syntax, e.g.:
- `is:unread in:inbox`
- `from:someone@example.com`
- `subject:invoice newer_than:7d`
- `category:primary is:unread`
- `has:attachment`

Returns enriched summaries (subject, from, to, date, snippet, labels).

Search emails using Gmail query syntax.

Examples:
- `is:unread category:primary` — unread primary emails
- `from:boss@company.com newer_than:3d` — recent emails from boss
- `in:sent to:client@example.com` — sent emails to a client
- `subject:meeting after:2026/02/01` — meetings since Feb 1

Read a full email — complete body (no truncation), all headers, labels,
thread_id, and attachment metadata.

post.description: Read multiple emails by ID in a single call.

get.description: Get all messages in a conversation thread.

post.description: Send an email with optional cc, bcc, and HTML body.
Reply to an email in its thread with proper In-Reply-To/References headers.

Add/remove labels on messages.

Common patterns:
- Archive:     remove_labels=["INBOX"]
- Mark read:   remove_labels=["UNREAD"]
- Mark unread: add_labels=["UNREAD"]
- Star:        add_labels=["STARRED"]
- Trash:       add_labels=["TRASH"]

get.description: Download an attachment by its attachment_id (returned in email read results).
List upcoming calendar events.
Get a specific calendar event.

post.description: Create or update a secret for an agent + service combination.

get.description: List all secrets for a given agent (returns service names only, not the data).
Get the full secret data for an agent + service.

delete.description: Delete a secret for an agent + service.

CreateSkillRequest.title: CreateSkillRequest
CreateSkillRequest.description: Create a new skill. `name` becomes the folder slug (kebab-case).

UpdateSkillRequest.title: UpdateSkillRequest
UpdateSkillRequest.description: Update the SKILL.md content for an existing skill.
